last_episode_to_air.name: Suicide Squad
last_episode_to_air.overview: McCall comes to the aid of a college student who's lost his athletic scholarship and fears disappointing his parents, and turns to drug dealing as a way to make the big money they expect.

name: The Equalizer
overview: Robert McCall is a former agent of a secret government agency who is now running his own private crime fighting operation where he fashions himself as "The Equalizer." It is a service for victims of the system who have exhausted all possible means of seeking justice and have nowhere to go. McCall promises to even out the odds for them.

episodes.name: Pilot: The Equalizer
episodes.overview: A former government agent offers his services to people facing problems too big for them to handle, such as a woman being stalked by a psychopath and a man who learns of a blackmail scheme involving government officials.

episodes.name: China Rain
episodes.overview: McCall comes to the aid of a housekeeper when kidnappers grab her son by mistake.

episodes.name: The Defector
episodes.overview: McCall helps a double agent defect and a young boy stand up to bullies.

episodes.name: The Lock Box
episodes.overview: McCall helps a man whose daughter has been abducted by a pimp who services covert government operations.

episodes.name: Lady Cop
episodes.overview: A crooked cop is willing to murder to ensure that his new partner won't blow the whistle on his operations.

episodes.name: The Confirmation Day
episodes.overview: McCall helps a former showgirl convinced someone is stalking her and a boy whose father helped steal antiques now wanted by two separate parties.

episodes.name: The Children's Song
episodes.overview: Father and son protect a girl from would-be rapists intent on killing the only witness to a murder.

episodes.name: The Distant Fire
episodes.overview: A hit man wants help to prevent another killer from murdering a woman both McCall and the hitman once loved.

episodes.name: Mama's Boy
episodes.overview: A career woman wants McCall's aid in ending her son's fascination with a charismatic drug dealer.

episodes.name: Bump and Run
episodes.overview: Muggers seek revenge on a student who injured one of them while escaping, and a vigilante killer pins McCall's ad to his victims.

episodes.name: Desperately
episodes.overview: A lonely, neglected wife gets more than she wanted when she considers a fling and ends up witnessing a murder.

episodes.name: Reign of Terror
episodes.overview: The new doctor at a local clinic refuses to give gang members drugs as `rent' for using their turf.

episodes.name: Back Home
episodes.overview: A banker is harassing tenants of a potentially valuable property and planning to murder his wife.

episodes.name: Out of the Past
episodes.overview: An ex-con is harassing the man whose testimony put him away-the man now married to McCall's former wife.

episodes.name: Dead Drop
episodes.overview: McCall assembles some old friends to protect a man marked for murder for no apparent reason.

episodes.name: Wash Up
episodes.overview: A window washer witnesses the murder of his pro-union partner by their anti-union boss, who has his own witnesses to back his self-defense claim.

episodes.name: Torn
episodes.overview: McCall tries to divide his time between defending a woman from her abusive husband and settling with an old enemy.

episodes.name: Unnatural Causes
episodes.overview: McCall's on the trail of a serial killer, leaving him little time for an actress fallen into the wrong crowd.

episodes.name: Breakpoint
episodes.overview: McCall is among those taken hostage by terrorists seeking a Middle Eastern philanthropist.

episodes.name: No Conscience
episodes.overview: A womanizer is abducted and threatened with death if he doesn't give his captors what they want-but he can't figure out what.

episodes.name: Unpunished Crimes
episodes.overview: McCall is hired by an inventor whose designs were stolen by a huge corporation headed by a ruthless executive.

episodes.name: Pretenders
episodes.overview: An aspiring reporter, desperate for a scoop that will get her notice and a promotion, becomes convinced that something big is happening right in the next apartment.

episodes.name: Prelude
episodes.overview: Men working for a dictator McCall helped put into power kidnap an American journalist.

episodes.name: Nocturne
episodes.overview: A blind music critic asks for help when she hears the voice of the man who raped her years before.

episodes.name: A Community of Civilized Men
episodes.overview: McCall comes to the aid of a woman who's being squeezed to pay off her late husband's debts.

episodes.name: Joyride
episodes.overview: Two boys drive off in a hearse; not knowing it contains a coffin full of crack.

episodes.name: Shades of Darkness
episodes.overview: McCall helps a National Guardsman who faces a murder charge and threats from the real killer.

episodes.name: Nightscape
episodes.overview: A rape victim asks McCall to stop her husband from tracking down her attackers.

episodes.name: Counterfire
episodes.overview: The odds are against McCall when he's framed for the murder of a blind man.

episodes.name: The Line
episodes.overview: The mother of a youth killed while being harassed by an overzealous citizen's patrol appeals to McCall for help.

episodes.name: Tip On a Sure Thing
episodes.overview: A bookie that doesn't like the odds on a race kidnaps the son of the jockey and demands the father throw the race.

episodes.name: The Cup
episodes.overview: Father Kostmayer hears the confession of a Polish agitator moments before he's gunned down.

episodes.name: Heartstrings
episodes.overview: A woman asks McCall for help recovering her kidnapped newborn son.

episodes.name: High Performance
episodes.overview: A construction worker becomes both witness and target when she sees a murder and is spotted by the killer.

episodes.name: Beyond Control
episodes.overview: Control becomes McCall's client when a KGB agent who infiltrated a think tank is murdered.

episodes.name: Carnal Persuasion
episodes.overview: A wife appeals to the judge sentencing her husband and is offered her husband's freedom for sexual favors.

episodes.name: Memories of Manon (1)
episodes.overview: Control's goddaughter is threatened with the death of her father, a Canadian agent, unless she can reveal his informant. Then with little time left, McCall tells Kostmayer of his personal reasons for wanting to save Yvette and her father.

episodes.name: Memories of Manon (2)
episodes.overview: Control's goddaughter is threatened with the death of her father, a Canadian agent, unless she can reveal his informant. Then with little time left, McCall tells Kostmayer of his personal reasons for wanting to save Yvette and her father.

episodes.name: Solo
episodes.overview: McCall gets involved romantically and professionally with a woman wanted in Pennsylvania for killing a cop.

episodes.name: A Place To Stay
episodes.overview: A young girl runs away from her quarreling parents and into the hands of a child pornographer.

episodes.name: Coal Black Soul
episodes.overview: McCall is torn between a lovely psychiatrist and a man who calls and says he can't stop himself from murdering women.

episodes.name: First Light
episodes.overview: While McCall is testifying in Washington, Scott tries his hand and looks for thugs harassing a local merchant.

episodes.name: Hand and Glove
episodes.overview: Nightmares become a reality for an invalid woman when a threatening figures from her dreams appears in her room.

episodes.name: Re-Entry
episodes.overview: McCall helps a young boy whose father was tricked into committing a crime.

episodes.name: Blood & Wine (1)
episodes.overview: McCall and a former terrorist, now a monk, are both searching for the monk's former partner, a terrorist who uses plastic surgery after each assignment to keep ahead of his enemies.

episodes.name: Blood & Wine (2)
episodes.overview: McCall and a former terrorist, now a monk, are both searching for the monk's former partner, a terrorist who uses plastic surgery after each assignment to keep ahead of his enemies.

episodes.name: Suspicion of Innocence
episodes.overview: McCall regrets persuading a young retarded friend of his into going to the police after he witnesses a murder; he's arrested for the crime.

episodes.name: In the Money
episodes.overview: The trading on Wall Street gets a little rough; McCall and Mickey pull a half-drowned woman from the river after she gets in the way of some ruthless manipulators.

episodes.name: Encounter in a Closed Room
episodes.overview: McCall tries to help a European defector free her parents from the KGB, who have kidnaped them to exert pressure on her to persuade another defector to return to their homeland.

episodes.name: Mission: McCall (1)
episodes.overview: Scott discovers that his father has been kidnapped by someone, and following his father's instructions, contacts an old Company colleague, Richard Dyson, who sets things in motion to find out who has McCall and to get him back.

episodes.name: Mission: McCall (2)
episodes.overview: Scott discovers that his father has been kidnapped by someone, and following his father's instructions, contacts an old Company colleague, Richard Dyson, who sets things in motion to find out who has McCall and to get him back.

episodes.name: Shadow Play
episodes.overview: McCall helps a fellow Intelligence officer stay alive despite someone's efforts to keep him from talking to a Congressional committee.

episodes.name: Inner View
episodes.overview: A psychic can't convince the police that she has `seen' the next attack of a serial killer, so she turns to McCall for help in preventing it.

episodes.name: The Rehearsal
episodes.overview: McCall and Kostmayer are caught with an acting company rehearsing a new work when a psychopath boobytraps the theater exits with bombs.

episodes.name: Christmas Presence
episodes.overview: McCall asks Harley to help him handle a request for help from a six-year-old AIDS victim who is living with his grandmother and facing increasingly violent harassment from the frightened and angry neighbors.

episodes.name: A Dance on the Dark Side
episodes.overview: A police station switchboard operator overhears a detective discussing the murder of his former partner and goes to McCall for help when she receives threats to keep her quiet.

episodes.name: The Child Broker
episodes.overview: A young woman asks McCall to help her boyfriend break away from the control of a junior Fagin.

episodes.name: Video Games
episodes.overview: A reporter's wife asks McCall to find her husband, who has disappeared while working undercover on a call-girl operation involving blackmail and the death of his daughter.

episodes.name: Something Green
episodes.overview: The ex-wife of a European diplomat asks McCall to help her retrieve her son from his father before he can leave the country with the boy and $10 million in mob money.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Manon (1)
episodes.overview: Yvette Marcel asks her godfather Control and McCall for help dealing with her irrational father, who is intent on locating Manon, the mother she believed had been killed years before.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Manon (2)
episodes.overview: Yvette Marcel asks her godfather Control and McCall for help dealing with her irrational father, who is intent on locating Manon, the mother she believed had been killed years before.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: McCall comes to the aid of a recently dispossessed man and his family who has been moved in a welfare hotel and is facing pressure from the landlord to take part in his welfare scams.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: A rapist being hunted by a mob assassin takes hostage Kostmayer, Pete and several customers.

episodes.name: Regrets Only
episodes.overview: A young woman trying to start her life over faces continuing harassment from her upscale, professional husband who won't let her go but who is smart enough to conceal his activities.

episodes.name: Target of Choice
episodes.overview: A man fears for his life and that of his family when the murderer he helped put away is paroled and turns up living in his neighborhood.

episodes.name: Always a Lady
episodes.overview: McCall's former protege at the Agency calls in a panic when she is apparently framed for the theft of a large amount of money from her gangster employer, but he arrives too late to save her life.

episodes.name: The Last Campaign
episodes.overview: The aide to an ambitious candidate for state senator discovers that her boss is blackmailing the incumbent into endorsing his candidacy.

episodes.name: Sea of Fire
episodes.overview: A desperate high school principal calls on McCall for help in combating the gang responsible for the rape of a girl in the school gymnasium.

episodes.name: Riding the Elephant
episodes.overview: McCall helps a Thai boxer and his girl friend extricate themselves from the clutches of a racketeer with old connections to McCall's former employers.

episodes.name: Eighteen With a Bullet
episodes.overview: McCall and Mickey try to help a young rock singer escape from her greedy, immoral manager.

episodes.name: The Day of the Covenant
episodes.overview: Scott learns first hand about the anti-apartheid movement when his girl friend becomes the target of a zealous Afrikaner who believes she's a terrorist.

episodes.name: Splinters
episodes.overview: Mickey Kostmayer is captured when a Company operation fails, and he's turned against McCall using drugs and torture.

episodes.name: The Making of a Martyr
episodes.overview: A gun control advocate whose husband was crippled by a stray bullet seeks McCall's help when she receives threatening phone calls.

episodes.name: The Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: McCall reluctantly agrees to help the wife of a mobster find her kidnapped son, who's a pawn in a game of revenge against his father.

episodes.name: The Visitation
episodes.overview: McCall's reunion with a former lover is interrupted when her medical skills are needed to deal with a deadly virus being carried by a pair of thugs responsible for killing an international arms dealer.

episodes.name: Past Imperfect
episodes.overview: An international crime cartel tries to use a man's estranged son against him when the man refuses to honor their wishes.

episodes.name: Trial By Ordeal
episodes.overview: McCall becomes the defense counsel when a Company tribunal on charges of treason tries Control.

episodes.name: Silent Fury
episodes.overview: McCall tries to help a young woman who is one of the victims of a series of robberies directed against the deaf community.

episodes.name: Lullaby of Darkness
episodes.overview: McCall tries to help a woman and her daughter escape from her abusive husband.

episodes.name: 17 Zebra
episodes.overview: McCall investigates when a mission worker tells him about several winos who have died from heart attacks enroute to the hospital in paramedic ambulances.

episodes.name: Starfire
episodes.overview: McCall tries to help a girl and her friend, a confused man who claims to an extraterrestrial being hunted by killers.

episodes.name: Time Present, Time Past
episodes.overview: Scott is kidnapped along with a former Bulgarian agent McCall helped to defect ten years earlier, and later undergoes his baptism into his father's world when he accompanies a team trying to rescue the man.

episodes.name: Prisoners of Conscience
episodes.overview: McCall's search for a kidnapped Chilean poet gets very intense when he learns the kidnapper killed his father many years ago.

episodes.name: The Caper
episodes.overview: A cleaning woman works at cross-purposes to McCall as she tries to solve a murder she witnessed.

episodes.name: Heart of Justice
episodes.overview: A bitter man tries to get revenge on the men who brutalized his wife but he calls McCall when someone else gets them first.

episodes.name: Race Traitors
episodes.overview: McCall answers a call for help from Kostmayer's old neighborhood, where a racist group is harassing a black family.

episodes.name: Endgame
episodes.overview: McCall helps two sisters whom are the victims of a revenge that has been plotted by a master strategy game player.

episodes.name: Suicide Squad
episodes.overview: McCall comes to the aid of a college student who's lost his athletic scholarship and fears disappointing his parents, and turns to drug dealing as a way to make the big money they expect.
